SnippetValue.Code:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/23139910/mvc4-site-publish-to-somee
As @Ehsan Sajjad said there was a problem with the FTP. Site path is required in Somee.
Here is the way to configure the publish tool under the connection section:
Publish method: FTP Server: ftp://[YOUR USERNAME].somee.com Site path: /www.[YOUR USERNAME].somee.com/ Passive mode: Checked User name: [YOUR USERNAME] Password: [YOUR PASSWORD]
You may try other alternative to upload your files, please just download Filezilla tools and then please upload it to your root folder
========================================================================================
Publish method: FTP Server: ftp://domain.somee.com { FiveHappiness.somee.com } Site path: Protected.domain.somee.com Passive mode: Checked User name: [YOUR USERNAME] Password: [YOUR PASSWORD]
As I publish above and i succeeded.. ======================================================================================
or site path: www. your domain.somee.com – Tarık Eren Tan Nov 1 '14 at 23:53
